meaningMnemonic: When you <kanji>pave</kanji> and <kanji>attire</kanji> something, you’ll end up with a <vocabulary>pavement</vocabulary>. Imagine the asphalt used in the paving of a street as its attire and this’ll make sense!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
